mapper.sql: row_id, district_id, epu_name, epu_local, epu_province, epu_city, epu_district, epu_type, epu_xscale, epu_yscale, epu_parent_id, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID, DEL_FLAG, address_id,channel_id,channel_id_two,channel_id_three,line_id
mapper.select:
select
from view_epu_info where row_id = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG='0'
SELECT DISTINCT C_DistrictBCDId AS district_id FROM t_ndtu order by C_DistrictBCDId
SELECT C_ChannelNum AS channel_id FROM t_ndtu where C_DistrictBCDId= #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and C_AddressId= #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by C_ChannelNum
SELECT C_AddressId AS address_id FROM t_ndtu where C_DistrictBCDId = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by C_AddressId
SELECT DISTINCT C_DistrictBCDId AS district_id FROM t_bdtu order by C_DistrictBCDId
SELECT C_ChannelNum AS channel_id FROM t_bdtu where C_DistrictBCDId= #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and C_AddressId= #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by C_ChannelNum
SELECT C_AddressId AS address_id FROM t_bdtu where C_DistrictBCDId = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by C_AddressId

select
from view_epu_info where epu_type = #{epuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and epu_district = #{epuDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG='0'

mapper.update:
update
t_substain
t_outgoingCabinet
t_branchBox
t_meterBox
C_DistrictBCDId = #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
epu_name = #{epuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
epu_local = #{epuLocal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
epu_province = #{epuProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
epu_city = #{epuCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
epu_district = #{epuDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
epu_xscale = #{epuXscale,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
epu_yscale = #{epuYscale,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
substainId =#{epuParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
outgoingCabinetId=#{epuParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
branchBoxId=#{epuParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_AddressId = #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ChannelNum = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ChannelId=#{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ChannelNum = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ChannelId_Two=#{channelIdTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ChannelId_Three=#{channelIdThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
line_id = #{lineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where 1=1
and substainId = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and outgoingCabinetId= #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and branchBoxId = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and meterBoxId = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and DEL_FLAG='0'
update t_substain set epu_xscale = null, epu_yscale = null where substainId = #{rowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG='0'
mapper.select:
select
from view_epu_info where epu_name = #{epuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and epu_district = #{epuDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and epu_type = #{epuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DEL_FLAG='0'

SELECT C_AddressId AS address_id FROM
t_outgoingCabinet
t_meterBox
where C_DistrictBCDId = #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by C_AddressId

SELECT channel_id FROM
branchBoxId
t_meter
where C_DistrictBCDId= #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and C_AddressId= #{addressId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and order by C_AddressId
